title: Understanding Privacy Laws
text: Consider how privacy laws are designed to protect individuals' personal information. Is there a balance between protecting privacy and allowing companies to use data for innovation?

title: Impact on Companies
text: Reflect on how strict privacy laws might affect companies' ability to innovate. How might these laws be perceived by companies trying to develop new technologies?

title: Perception of Engineers
text: Think about the narrative that might be created around engineers and their role in privacy. How might privacy laws influence public perception of engineers' intentions?
